attributes.action: Have the hideous London 2012 logo re-designed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This new logo is an insult to the taxpayer, we are supposed to be representing something great, and instead a complete un-imaginitive piece of twaddle is presented. Let's have some effort and real imagination going into it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
